p: Data are expressed as mean ± SD. Outcomes were compared among groups using one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) followed by Dunnett’s multiple comparison test. Categories variables were performed by rank-sum test. Kruskal–Wallis test followed by multiple comparison test was used to assess differences between myocardial pathological scores. Statistical analyses were performed using SPSS 22.0 software. A value of p< 0.05 was considered statistically significant.
